content: उत्पीड् {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To press against, strike or rub against; अन्योन्यमुत्पीडयदुत्पलाक्ष्याः <ls>Ku. 1. 40</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 66.</ls> {@--2@} To throw or strike upwards; press out, propel. urge; <ls>R. 16. 66</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 46.</ls> {@--3@} To overwhelm, overpower, trouble; <ls>K. 242.</ls>
